abstract: New York Yankees agree to $3.3 million, one-year contract with pitcher Ivan Nova; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Pitcher Ivan Nova and the Yankees agreed to a one-year contract for $3.3 million, the same salary he earned in 2014, when he missed most of the season because of a torn elbow ligament.
snippet: Pitcher Ivan Nova and the Yankees agreed to a one-year contract for $3.3 million, the same salary he earned in 2014, when he missed most of the season because of a torn elbow ligament.

headline.main: Ivan Nova and Yankees Have a Deal
headline.print_headline: Nova and Yanks Have a Deal
